name: Internal Test
description:
WASD/Arrows

You control space ship, which is affected my wind. It changes direction time by time. Don't touch the edges. Also be aware of deadly meteors! Survive as long as you can and collect as many bolts as possible to get maximum score!

This game was made for Cowboy's jam in a day. The music was made by me week ago for my other game though, but added here as it fits the theme. Only 3D Spaceship and asteroids aren't made by me.

Have fun!
